class,dsa.function,tests.LND7Function
dsa.chromosomelength,1000
dsa.maxallelevalue,100.0
dsa.minallelevalue,-100.0
dsa.numouteriters,5000
dsa.numtriesperiter,100
dsa.movedelta,0.1
dsa.K,20.0
rndgen,7,1
dsa.numthreads,1
class,dsa.randomchromosomemaker,popt4jlib.SA.DblArray1CMaker
class,dsa.movemaker,popt4jlib.SA.DblArray1MoveMaker
class,dsa.localoptimizer,popt4jlib.GradientDescent.FletcherConjugateGradientST
fcg.maxiters,1000
fcg.maxbracketingiters,1000
fcg.maxsectioningiters,1000
fcg.gtol,1.e-5
fcg.redrate,5.0
